summary: A simple retexture/recolor mod for the warglaives from jojjo\'s \"Warglaives and Silverlight Armor\" mod.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple retexture for the warglaives from jojjo\'s \"Warglaives and Silverlight Armor\".
The original mod is required and can be found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10251/?

The new textures are a lot darker but still very shiny. 

Installation: Just extract the texture folder into your Skyrim/Data folder

All credit goes to jojjo; if u like his mod, endorse it
author: Schlaftier
